about_the_game:
Enter an amazing manga universe and live a great adventure!

Create your own guild of the greatest warrior and defeat opponents in thrilling contests.
In Manga RPG, you'll enjoy a real RPG with tons of great illustrations, adventures and fights.
Explore a manga universe, recruit them to your team, grow your guild, and build up your hero to defeat other players in strategic battles!

Key features

An original story embedded with manga, comic books, video games, and pop culture! Discover the manga RGP adventure through the visual novel format with plenty of humor and hilarious references. Enjoy hundreds of original illustrations, accessible to all players for free.

Exciting Events

Every month there will be several events that will introduce you to new characters and will give you the chance to craft your perfect team with different strategies, stat management and be the leaderboard master.

Character buildup

Get the best equipment at the Market to raise your skills to the top!

PvP & Leaderboard

Increase your guild performance and defy players from all over the world to take the top spot on the international & national leaderboards!

Challenge the Champions

Show the prowess of your fighter in your Guild and impress the Champions: they will praise you by gifting you new characters and other awards.

Join forces to win

Start or join a Club together with other players to win amazing awards.

Can you create the greatest guild of this manga world?
Find out in Manga RPG!
